name: Shape The World (Tiegerator)
description:
This is a Clicker/Puzzle Game where your goal is to shape the World as you like!

But look Out!

You have to balance your Reputation in Order to not Loose! 

Easy - between -25 and 25

Normal - between -20 and 20

Expert - between -15 and 15

This Game Idea came from the Trijam 153, and I wanted to turn it into a full Game with unlimited Time!

I know it is by far not a complete Game, but that i all I've could come up to in about 2 Weeks of Development
